author: Warhammer
description:
Ashes of the Imperium is the first book in Black Library's thrilling new series The Scouring. Author Chris Wraight sits down to discuss some of what goes into writing such massive stories: https://www.warhammer-community.com/en-gb/articles/pzj94hyz/ashes-of-the-imperium-interview-chris-wraight-gets-stuck-into-the-scouring/

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
- Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community.com/
- Get Warhammer in your inbox: https://ow.ly/6SJq50T3NL1
title: Black Library Ashes of the Imperium Author Interview | Warhammer

author: Warhammer
description:
Ferren Areios, Captain of the Ultramarines’ 6th Company, is a warrior forged in the fires of the Indomitus Crusade. Chosen by the Primarch to lead his brothers in battle, the Master of Rites fights for the survival of Humanity and the realm of Ultramar. Tune in to this paint guide to see Ollie show you how to paint this awesome new character quickly and easily!

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Base:
Abaddon Black
Celestra Grey
Corax White
Khorne Red
Leadbelcher
Macragge Blue
Mechanicus Standard Grey
Retributor Armour
Rhinox Hide
Screamer Pink
Wraithbone

Layer:
Calgar Blue
Evil Sunz Scarlet
Fenrisian Grey
Fire Dragon Bright
Stormhost Silver
Wild Rider Red

Shade:
Nuln Oil

Contrast:
Guilliman Flesh

Technical:
Lahmian Medium

Tools:
S Layer
S Dry
M Shade
L Shade
M Base
L Base

If you enjoyed this and want to learn more, our YouTube channel has an array of beginner-friendly videos to get you started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://w
title: How to Paint Ferren Areios | Warhammer 40,000
